00019 ComposeExample::ComposeExample(WContainerWidget *parent)
00020   : WContainerWidget(parent)
00021 {
00022   composer_ = new Composer(this);
00023 
00024   std::vector<Contact> addressBook;
00025   addressBook.push_back(Contact(L"Koen Deforche",
00026                                 L"koen.deforche@gmail.com"));
00027   addressBook.push_back(Contact(L"Koen alias1",
00028                                 L"koen.alias1@yahoo.com"));
00029   addressBook.push_back(Contact(L"Koen alias2",
00030                                 L"koen.alias2@yahoo.com"));
00031   addressBook.push_back(Contact(L"Koen alias3",
00032                                 L"koen.alias3@yahoo.com"));
00033   addressBook.push_back(Contact(L"Bartje",
00034                                 L"jafar@hotmail.com"));
00035   composer_->setAddressBook(addressBook);
00036 
00037   std::vector<Contact> contacts;
00038   contacts.push_back(Contact(L"Koen Deforche", L"koen.deforche@gmail.com"));
00039 
00040   composer_->setTo(contacts);
00041   composer_->setSubject(L"That's cool! Want to start your own google?");
00042 
00043   composer_->send.connect(SLOT(this, ComposeExample::send));
00044   composer_->discard.connect(SLOT(this, ComposeExample::discard));
00045 
00046   details_ = new WContainerWidget(this);
00047 
00048   new WText(tr("example.info"), details_);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void ComposeExample::send()
00052 {
00053   WContainerWidget *feedback = new WContainerWidget(this);
00054   feedback->setStyleClass(L"feedback");
00055 
00056   WContainerWidget *horiz = new WContainerWidget(feedback);
00057   new WText(L"<p>We could have, but did not send the following email:</p>",
00058             horiz);
00059 
00060   std::vector<Contact> contacts = composer_->to();
00061   if (!contacts.empty())
00062     horiz = new WContainerWidget(feedback);
00063   for (unsigned i = 0; i < contacts.size(); ++i) {
00064     WText *t = new WText(L"To: \"" + contacts[i].name + L"\" <"
00065                          + contacts[i].email + L">", horiz);
00066     t->setFormatting(WText::PlainFormatting);
00067     new WBreak(horiz);
00068   }
00069 
00070   contacts = composer_->cc();
00071   if (!contacts.empty())
00072     horiz = new WContainerWidget(feedback);
00073   for (unsigned i = 0; i < contacts.size(); ++i) {
00074     WText *t = new WText(L"Cc: \"" + contacts[i].name + L"\" <"
00075                          + contacts[i].email + L">", horiz);
00076     t->setFormatting(WText::PlainFormatting);
00077     new WBreak(horiz);
00078   }
00079   
00080   contacts = composer_->bcc();
00081   if (!contacts.empty())
00082     horiz = new WContainerWidget(feedback);
00083   for (unsigned i = 0; i < contacts.size(); ++i) {
00084     WText *t = new WText(L"Bcc: \"" + contacts[i].name + L"\" <"
00085                          + contacts[i].email + L">", horiz);
00086     t->setFormatting(WText::PlainFormatting);
00087     new WBreak(horiz);
00088   }
00089 
00090   horiz = new WContainerWidget(feedback);
00091   WText *t = new WText(L"Subject: \"" + composer_->subject() + L"\"", horiz);
00092   t->setFormatting(WText::PlainFormatting);
00093 
00094   std::vector<Attachment> attachments = composer_->attachments();
00095   if (!attachments.empty())
00096     horiz = new WContainerWidget(feedback);
00097   for (unsigned i = 0; i < attachments.size(); ++i) {
00098     WText *t = new WText(L"Attachment: \""
00099                          + attachments[i].fileName
00100                          + L"\" (" + attachments[i].contentDescription
00101                          + L")", horiz);
00102     t->setFormatting(WText::PlainFormatting);
00103 
00104     unlink(attachments[i].spoolFileName.c_str());
00105 
00106     t = new WText(L", was in spool file: "
00107                   + widen(attachments[i].spoolFileName), horiz);
00108     new WBreak(horiz);
00109   }
00110 
00111   std::wstring message = composer_->message();
00112 
00113   horiz = new WContainerWidget(feedback);
00114   t = new WText(L"Message body: ", horiz);
00115   new WBreak(horiz);
00116 
00117   if (!message.empty()) {
00118     t = new WText(message, horiz);
00119     t->setFormatting(WText::PlainFormatting);
00120   } else
00121     t = new WText(L"<i>(empty)</i>", horiz);
00122 
00123   delete composer_;
00124   delete details_;
00125 
00126   wApp->quit();
00127 }
00128 
00129 void ComposeExample::discard()
00130 {
00131   WContainerWidget *feedback = new WContainerWidget(this);
00132   feedback->setStyleClass(L"feedback");
00133 
00134   WContainerWidget *horiz = new WContainerWidget(feedback);
00135   new WText(L"<p>Wise decision! Everyone's mailbox is already full anyway.</p>",
00136             horiz);
00137 
00138   delete composer_;
00139   delete details_;
00140 
00141   wApp->quit();
00142 }
00143 
00144 WApplication *createApplication(const WEnvironment& env)
00145 {
00146   WApplication *app = new WApplication(env);
00147   app->messageResourceBundle().use("composer");
00148   app->setTitle(L"Composer example");
00149   app->useStyleSheet("composer.css");
00150 
00151   app->root()->addWidget(new ComposeExample());
00152 
00153   return app;
00154 }
00155 
00156 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00157 {
00158    return WRun(argc, argv, &createApplication);
00159 }
